data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 299,600 souls in Mambéré-Kadéï and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 45 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 117,820 people in the state of Mambéré-Kadéï who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 299,600 souls living in the state of Mambéré-Kadéï with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.section_summary:
the state of Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic has a population of 299,600.

We estimate Mambéré-Kadéï has 96,108 people who might know Jesus, 117,820 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 85,672 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Mambéré-Kadéï, Central African Republic to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
